mph.beans.sessions

Interface StudentManagerRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ArtifactEditingFunctionalities, ArtifactViewerFunctionalities, BasicUserManagerInterface, CourseViewerFunctionalities, DeliverableViewerFunctionalities, ProjectViewerFunctionalities, TeamBasicFunctionalities, TeamCreationFunctionalities, TeamManagementFunctionalities, TeamViewerFunctionalities, UserEditingFunctionalities, UserLoginFunctionalities, UserRegisteringFunctionalities, UserSessionInterface, UserViewerFunctionalities
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StudentManager

    public interface StudentManagerRemote
extends BasicUserManagerInterface, UserRegisteringFunctionalities, ArtifactEditingFunctionalities, TeamManagementFunctionalities, TeamCreationFunctionalities, TeamBasicFunctionalities
    This remote interface will be implemented by the StudentManager classes in the server and client.
    It provides the methods available to students.

    It extends BasicUserManagerInterface, UserRegisteringFunctionalities, ArtifactEditingFunctionalities, TeamManagementFunctionalities, TeamCreationFunctionalities, TeamBasicFunctionalities.
